Body:
I was taught X' theory in generative grammar lectures, only to find out that NLP uses mainly surface grammar-based theories, such as HPSG or statistical models such as hidden Markov models.

Is X' of any use for NLP at its current state of the art?
Title: Is there practical application of X' theory in natural language processing?
